entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
